channel.title: Trying to install whonix via virtual machine and I am stuck on sudo get-apt dist-upgrade
channel.description:
I was supposed to do sudo apt-get dist-upgrade and got this:
Setting up flatpak (1.10.5-0+deb11u1) … Processing triggers for dbus (1.12.20-2) … Processing triggers for man-db (2.9.4-2) …dating the gateway and workstation virtual machines so I can try this out.

item.title: Trying to install whonix via virtual machine and I am stuck on sudo get-apt dist-upgrade
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Unclear what the issue is. Please see:

Whonix – 30 Sep 21

Bug Reports, Software Development and Feature Requests

How to Report (Security) Bugs in the Whonix ™ Operating System. Software development cycle, patches, and responsiveness to feedback and feature requests.

Read full topic
